channel.title: How come?
channel.description:
I made Castle Wars. Then, I have problem with making it a PKing zone but you don't lose stuff and you respawn at your castle.
And now, I have -50 wildy levels in it and you respawn at home and you lose stuff. Can someone help me please ?
Add my MSN: ineedhelpfrugooscape@hotmail.com Thanks.

item.title: How come?
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

runefreak10:

Make an exception in your isInWilderness method and make the exception the coordinates for the whole castle wars arena. Then make it so if it’s that exception, it will teleport you to the spawning rooms and not remove your items.

I’m so confused. -.-
I would need someone to MSN me.

Read full topic

@runefreak10 wrote:
